title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 268: ft. Milan Lucic
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Milan Lucic. Looch joins (32:42) to talk about the Battle of Alberta, winning the cup in Boston in 2011, Johnny Boychuk and a bunch more. The guys also talk some NHL news including the NHL draft and what the next steps for the NHL might be. The guys wrap up talking about Michael Jordan and 'The Last Dance'.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
